data.message: People don't understand the level of favor I am doing the world by letting these lil shit faces talk sh.t to me so I can tone them down for the rest of the world and our children and the future. These actions serve to make the world and the future far less savage and intolerable... and help others truly understand eachother... there is no excuse to keep acting ignorant and abusive once you have learned this.. it is simply unacceptable.
